title: 12/29/2020 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 12/29/2020 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to the Patriots getting dominated on Monday Night Football and why the disappointing season for New England proves that Tom Brady is actually underrated. Colin gives his week 16 Herd Hierarchy with a surprise drop for one of the favorites to win the Super Bowl. Plus, Seahawks safety Jamal Adams joins the show to discuss their resurgent defense.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
